episodes.title: Saltwater and Silence: Synanon Cult Survival Story
episodes.description:
In this gripping continuation, Rachel Uchitel shares the disturbing truths behind the school that inspired Wayward — a place rooted in cult ideology, emotional manipulation, and forced conformity. From “running your anger” to waterboarding-style punishment, she recounts the rituals that rewired her identity and stripped away her sense of safety. Yet through it all, Rachel found a way to survive, lead, and eventually escape. This episode dives deep into the trauma, the transformation, and the complicated gratitude she still feels for the skills she gained — even as she confronts the cost of that conditioning.
